main event: A witness in Kansas City, Kansas reported seeing a reddish orange glow in the sky moving erratically in June 1964.
interesting points: The object hovered at times and then accelerated rapidly.
The weather conditions were clear with light winds.
No aircraft or balloons were known to be in the area.
The object was concluded to be an unidentified flying object (UFO).
sighted object: reddish orange glow in the sky
